Package com.mishmash.alpha.vehicleparts

Interface Summary
IDistanceModifierPart Interface implemented by any part that has a speed and time percentage modifier effect on a vehicle.
IVehiclePart The interface for all vehicle parts (which includes riders)
IVehicleTypeValidator Interface for type validator objects.
 

Class Summary
EqualityAndHashCodeTest Equals and HashCode testing were the most important and most difficult parts of making the part objects, and they are tested heavily here.
PartUtils Useful utility functions for vehicles and vehicle parts.
PartUtilsTest  
PowerPlant Class representing a vehicle power plant.
Rider Class representing a rider object.
UnaryValidator A UnaryValidator cares only about the type of vehicle, and not any additional arguments such as position.
UniversalValidator A UniversalValidator is valid on all types of vehicles with all parameters.
VehicleFrame Class representing a VehicleFrame.
Wheel Represents a wheel.
WheelPositionValidator Class used to validate a wheel based on vehicle type.
WheelPositionValidatorTest This is the most complicated of the validators, so it gets its own tests.
